# MLDataTable.Aggregator

**Structure**

A collection of column operations you can use with a data table’s `group` method.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Aggregator
```

## Overview

Use one or more [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLDataTable/Aggregator] instances when you use the [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLDataTable/group(columnsNamed:aggregators:)] method. Each aggregator performs a sequence of one or more [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLDataTable/Aggregator/Operations-swift.enum] for a single column. Each operation makes a new column in the new data table generated by the method.

## Creating an aggregator

- **init(operations:of:)**: Creates an aggregator with the given operations to perform on the given column.

## Configuring an aggregator

- **columnName**: The name of the column on which the aggregator performs operations on.
- **operations**: An array of operations to perform on a column.
- **MLDataTable.Aggregator.Operations**: The operations that an aggregator can perform on a column in a data table.

## Aggregating rows

- **group(columnsNamed:aggregators:)**: Creates a new data table with the given columns and adds a new column for each of the given aggregators.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
